title: Wukong... Primary:fighter Secondary:assassin
body:
Why is Wukong considered a tank.His passive gives him flat resistances.

He has high burst and stealth like an assassin

replies.body: high stealth? not really. high jukes? yes.
You think that riots categorisation is accurate? They have blitzcranks main position as fighter.

Yah true 
Mabey that was their original purpose
because he has his ult as CC, which also does alot of damage and makes you want to focus him to get rid of the damage/cc threat.
